topics.title: Pulse Introduction and Problem Statement
topics.summary: Introduction of Pulse as a decentralized messaging platform on Ergo blockchain offering true peer-to-peer communication. Identifies problems with centralized messaging platforms including corporate control over data, privacy violations, and potential for censorship and monitoring.

topics.title: Pulse Core Solution and Advanced Features
topics.summary: Presents Pulse's solution using Ergo blockchain for decentralized messaging with no central servers required. Covers advanced features including stealth addresses, live streaming capabilities, ERG token tipping, achievement systems, and chatbot integration for a complete Web3 social platform.

topics.title: Key Features and User Experience
topics.summary: Details key user-facing features including multiple wallet support, public channels, private rooms, anonymous messaging, and real-time synchronization. Emphasizes modern UI design with responsive interface and theme options.

topics.title: Technical Architecture and Implementation
topics.summary: Comprehensive overview of technical implementation including Ergo smart contracts, multi-UTXO transactions, Fleet SDK integration, real-time synchronization mechanisms, and advanced UX features. Covers privacy architecture with encryption and stealth capabilities.

topics.title: User Experience and Technology Stack
topics.summary: Highlights exceptional user experience designed for both crypto natives and mainstream users, featuring one-click wallet connection and intuitive features. Built using cutting-edge Web3 technologies including Next.js, Svelte, and TypeScript for a fully decentralized platform.
